mapper.select: select menu_id, menu_name, menu_url, menu_state, menu_del, menu_remark from menu_tb where menu_del = 0

select m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_url, m.parent_menu, m.menu_state, m.menu_del, m.menu_remark from menu_tb m, role_tb r, role_menu rm where m.menu_id = rm.menu_id and r.role_id = rm.role_id and r.role_id = (select role_id from user_role where user_id = #{userId})
